thread.title: Stay at Stella Artois chief's luxurious Cote d'Azur villa for just £21
thread.title_full: Stay at Stella Artois chief's luxurious Cote d'Azur villa for just £21 | Daily Mail Online

author: Katie Amey for MailOnline
title: Stay at Stella Artois chief's luxurious Cote d'Azur villa for just £21
text:
5 shares 1
View
comments
For those looking for the ultimate end-of-summer getaway, this stunning rental in the South of France may be just the ticket.
With four three-night breaks up for grabs, several lucky applicants will snag a holiday for four for just £7 per night.
Yes, the entire weekend along the Cote d'Azur will cost you and three friends just £21.
Thanks to Stella Artois and Airbnb, several lucky applicants will snag a luxury villa holiday for four for just £21
The project is a collaboration between Stella Artois Cidre and Airbnb.
Through the month of September, La Villa, which is rumoured to be the home of Le President of Stella Artois Cidre, will be up for grabs.
 Next You CAN at the Acropolis, you CAN'T at Disneyland: Handy new... Brits abroad on candid camera: Ugly truth of tourists'... From Milly Mackintosh's favourite fitness pop-up to Space's... Ohio zoo presses charges against man who jumped enclosure... Boasting five large bedrooms, complete with ensuite bathrooms, a picturesque pool, tennis courts, a state-of-the-art gym and breathtaking views of the Cote d'Azur coast, La Villa is a hidden gem along the French Riviera.
During each three-night stay a full itinerary of events and experiences will be on offer - everything from an evening soiree hosted by Le President's personal chef to a tour of St Paul de Vence, the nearby medieval town.
For the entire month of September, the opulent La Villa along the Cote d'Azur will be up for grabs
The property boasts five large bedrooms - each with an ensuite - as well as a pool, tennis courts and gym
A full weekend itinerary will be provided, including an evening soiree prepared by a personal chef
The weekend will also include tours of the local medieval town of St Paul de Vence and a dinner in Cannes
There, you'll have the chance to play Petanque, one of the President's favourite games, in the world famous city centre square.
On the final night of each stay, all guests will enjoy a glamorous Cannes evening, complete with a dinner on the beach.
And during the entire stay, Le President's personal assistant will be on hand to help with anything and everything you might need.
La Villa will be open for booking requests on Friday July 31, 11am-5pm, for the experience on September 12 through 15.
